item.title: What Does an Education Engineer Actually Do
item.description: Over Thanksgiving, my family had questions about what I do at work. In previous years, they were satisfied with “software engineer” — I made websites and apps. They weren’t sure what an education engineer actually does. At HashiCorp, education engineers design scenarios that emulate problems DevOps engineers may run into and guide them through a solution. As part of the Terraform Education team, these scenarios may come in the form of common use cases, like how to spin up a Kubernetes cluster in your favorite cloud, or highlighting new features practitioners may find useful, like curating public providers and modules within Terraform Cloud.
